name: Wireless Headphones
description: Experience the freedom of wireless listening with these high-quality headphones. Enjoy crisp, clear sound without the hassle of tangled cords.

name: Smartphone
description: Stay connected with the latest smartphone technology. Featuring a high-resolution display, powerful camera, and long-lasting battery life.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Track your fitness goals with precision using this advanced fitness tracker. Monitor your heart rate, steps taken, calories burned, and more.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Brew the perfect cup of coffee every time with this easy-to-use coffee maker. Its sleek design and programmable features make it a must-have for any kitchen.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Bring your music to life with this portable Bluetooth speaker. Enjoy rich, immersive sound quality whether you're at home or on the go.

name: Smartwatch
description: Stay connected and organized with this sleek smartwatch. Receive notifications, track your workouts, and monitor your health with ease.

name: Digital Camera
description: Capture life's moments in stunning detail with this high-performance digital camera. With advanced features and intuitive controls, it's perfect for both beginners and enthusiasts.

name: Laptop
description: Get the power and performance you need for work or play with this reliable laptop. Featuring a fast processor, high-resolution display, and long battery life.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Say goodbye to tangled wires with this sleek wireless mouse. Its ergonomic design and precision tracking make it ideal for both work and gaming.

name: Portable Charger
description: Never run out of battery again with this convenient portable charger. Compact and lightweight, it's perfect for keeping your devices powered up on the go.
